column5: Quaint 1BR (queen) guest cottage right on the water, access to private 330' lighted pier. Located on 4+ acres with 450' of frontage on Copano Bay. Private beach, fishing, kayaking and spectacular sunsets.   The 'little house' is next to a larger vacation home that is seldom used. Recently completely remodeled,
column8: Cozy Guest House on Copano Bay
